about_the_game:
The game requires loading time to start, please wait for a moment！！！
I hope you enjoy my game

In the game, you can choose to be a member of the human, demon, or elf race. Each character has an innate talent skill and an active skill, while the other three skills can be acquired through the in-game store.

The game world consists of six layers with different styles, each of which remains in the current world for various reasons.

Delve into the maps of Aranor and explore the Blighted Lands and Sacred Ruins to rescue the stranded creatures.

The maps contain three types of altars with different styles. By using the required resources, you can activate these altars, which are important means to enhance your character's attributes. Apart from the altars, there is another crucial resource in the map called the "Ascension Monument." Completing challenges will greatly boost your character's attributes.

The recovery attributes in the game are vital, so it's important to acquire skills or attributes that can restore health early on.

The Armory Shop offers equipment with attribute ratings ranging from R to SSR, making it an indispensable resource for obtaining attributes in the game.

There are a total of eight opportunities to enhance your attributes through Physical Training in each layer. Once you complete all the attributes of the current layer, you will advance to a new layer of Physical Training.

Finally, enter the world of Aranor and defeat the creatures from Aranor to survive.

name: UnderTheStars : 阿兰若

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Battle Survival Game,Explore maps and defeat enemies.Use mouse and keyboard to control the game.There is a loading time when the game starts.
